Protocol description:
n_sensors: number of horizontal and vertical sensors after interpolation
(optional)

bars: location of the cursor (in X and Y)

trace: ? (sorry, don't know what this was supposed to do; does not seem to do
anything useful)

range: minimum and maximum value to display (not entirely sure how I'm using
this, but I think the visualization is clipped to these values)

view: algorithm can show several data types; most interesting is "delta" (or
"raw" when debugging the sensor)

pause: either 0 or 1. If 0: continuous calibration of background level is
performed on those pixels where the delta of background level - current level is
below a certain limit. If 1: continuous calibration is disabled

mode: either "negative" (for pressure sensing) or "positive" (for presence
sensing)

fps: number of frames per second (currently about 12 - 15; can hopefully be
increased much more)

data: the actual data is in a one dimensional array (sorry; a 2D array would
have been nicer). In python I can convert it to a 2D array with data =
numpy.array(decoded['data']).reshape((n_sensors[1], n_sensors[0]))

state: one dimensional array that shows the state of each pixel. State is as
follows:
1: calibrating
2: released (difference between raw value and background value is less than a
certain threshold; pressure on pixel is very low or 0)
3: approaching (difference between raw value and background value is higher in
between two thresholds; not very useful for pressure sensing but useful for
touch sensing)
4: released_to_pressed: difference is higher than 2nd threshold, but not for
long enough; pixel is likely to be touched
5: pressed: difference is higher than 2nd threshold and for a longer time; pixel
is touched
6: pressed_to_released: difference is lower than 2nd threshold but not for long
enough; pixel is likely not touched any more

example of a json msg:

{"data":[12.1484,11.0801,8.55469,6.02734,5.5,7.95508,10.9453,14.9746,18.8594,20.7598,25.3242,27.7422,30.2578,35.7734,38.8086,41.5039,46.25,45.668,42.3398,42.0215,42.5313,44.9844,46.0078,48.1621,50.3516,47.7227,43.6406,43.4082,45.2031,44.25,44.7305,45.0508,46.8516,46.1094,45.3164,46.5859,48.8359,49.2441,49.1563,49.1738,50.6328,56.6836,62.8125,68.4199,76.1016,77.6543,82.2773,84.9609,91.5859,88.1719,83.6719,81.1563,77.5,77.3887,77.4336,77.5215,76.3828,76.3359,76.2578,76.5117,77.3438,14.5664,14.1958,12.1514,10.2285,8.7793,11.3701,14.8359,18.1846,21.7031,24.2788,26.3291,29.0713,32.2559,35.4297,37.4756,41.3931,45.25,43.3086,39.0967,39.356,39.6602,40.8291,42.4004,44.2422,46.1367,44.1079,41.8857,43.0708,44.4434,45.4385,46.5225,47.7969,50.2285,53.0845,57.167,61.4717,66.1348,66.9302,67.2402,68.1411,70.0566,74.7065,79.8203,85.5952,91.834,95.4014,100.416,103.981,110.221,106.226,101.972,98.1753,94.6777,90.9297,87.3496,83.7563,80.084,80.3022,80.9043,81.626,82.6855,16.9375,17.0801,15.7207,14.4346,13.6836,16.3301,18.9336,22.4043,26.6211,27.4629,29.6738,32.6904,36.1914,35.9531,38.1973,41.21,44.293,40.8096,37.3379,37.6025,37.8047,37.7578,38.9336,41.2021,43.4922,41.9062,42.3242,43.9678,45.7109,47.8789,50.082,52.6465,55.2578,62.1143,69.0488,76.0059,82.9141,84.623,85.4062,86.9971,89.1289,93.3555,98.082,103.243,108.574,113.256,118.514,123.734,128.824,124.23,119.717,116.149,111.902,104.537,97.5488,90.4238,83.2461,84.3691,85.5449,86.8311,88.0977,19.5098,20.0425,19.2939,18.6836,19.3711,21.271,23.4023,26.564,30.6562,31.3975,34.2422,37.4746,40.6973,40.0684,39.4863,40.9839,43.3887,38.5088,37.6611,37.417,37.4082,37.187,37.7715,39.3955,41.1406,41.3608,42.9941,44.9463,46.873,50.2988,53.8398,57.4243,61.5547,71.4067,81.0039,90.6118,100.283,102.261,103.632,105.883,108.281,111.957,116.798,121.295,126.055,131.197,136.622,142.403,148.225,142.301,137.928,134.231,129.127,118.162,108.17,97.7178,87.7148,89.063,90.8838,92.8535,95.0996,22.0313,23.0059,22.957,23.3203,25.1562,26.2871,28.4023,31.5293,34.7812,36
